__e: Mademoiselle Madsen avait été la nounou de Viktor. Elle faisait partie des meubles chez Viktor et Ida. Les enfants la prénommaient affectueusement Mads.
Miss Madsen had been Viktor's nanny, and as an old friend of the family, she came and went freely in his and Ida's home, where the children simply called her Mads.
